author: karl
msg: Support the default value when doing a select-list.

author: karl
msg: There's some problem with using a method that uses configvar to set a var as
a method in a class where the class is being inherited by a subclass that
redefines the variable.  I had to substitute "cget -varName" style

author: karl
msg: Added support for "-type select" when defining a DIOdisplay field, and
added a new "-values $list" to specify a list of things that will be available

author: karl
msg: searchBy is only in the response if something has been entered.

author: karl
msg: When adding a new record, if they've typed anything into the "is" field,
set the default value of the field specified in the "where" part to match.
